Configure Data Validation

Source: R/hot_functions.R
hot_validate.Rd

Configure Data Validation

Usage

hot_validate(
  hot,
  cols,
  type = c("numeric", "list", "regexp"),
  source = NULL,
  pattern = NULL,
  min = NULL,
  max = NULL,
  allowInvalid = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

hot

A handsontable widget object

cols

Column indices to apply validation (numeric vector)

type

Validation type: "numeric", "list", "regexp"

source

For "list" type, vector of allowed values

pattern

For "regexp" type, regular expression pattern

min, max

For "numeric" type, minimum and maximum values

allowInvalid

Logical, allow invalid values to be entered

...

Additional validation options

strict

Logical, strict validation mode

Value

Modified handsontable widget

Examples

if (interactive()) {
  library(shiny)

  ui <- fluidPage(
    titlePanel("Data Validation"),
    handsontableOutput("table")
  )

  server <- function(input, output, session) {
    df <- data.frame(
      score = c(85, 92, 78, 95, 88),
      grade = c("A", "A", "B", "A", "B"),
      email = c(
        "john@test.com", "jane@test.com", "bob@test.com",
        "alice@test.com", "charlie@test.com"
      )
    )

    output$table <- renderHandsontable({
      handsontable(df) |>
        hot_validate(cols = 1, type = "numeric", min = 0, max = 100) |>
        hot_validate(
          cols = 2, type = "list",
          source = c("A", "B", "C", "D", "F")
        ) |>
        hot_validate(
          cols = 3, type = "regexp",
          pattern = "^[\\w\\._%+-]+@[\\w\\.-]+\\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$"
        )
    })
  }

  shinyApp(ui, server)
}
